quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Zhou Hei Ya International Holdings Co. Ltd.
quote.nm: Zhou Hei Ya International Holdings Co. Ltd.
quote.summary: Zhou Hei Ya International Holdings Company Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the manufacture, sales and retail of casual braised food. The Company's main businesses include braised duck, duck by-products, braised red meat, braised vegetables, braised poultry and aquatic products and other products. The Company's product packaging mainly includes modified atmosphere fresh-keeping packaging and vacuum granule packaging. The Company has entered several mainstream domestic e-commerce platforms, developing emerging channel businesses in live streaming e-commerce, community retail and food delivery, including delivery services, private domain mini-programs, and lifestyle service platforms including Douyin and Meituan. The Company mainly conducts its businesses in the domestic market and overseas markets.
